DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare contrast agent image technique use thoracoabdominal aortic imaging CT . Imaging parameter contrast volume change adjust base contrast agent , since contrast agent vary iodine concentration . If contrast iodine concentration high , may possible adjust image parameter low overall radiation dose patient .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing thoracoabdominal aortic ( TAA ) CTA Able provide inform consent Body Mass Index ( BMI ) equal less 30 Creatinine great 2.0 Allergy contrast medium Pregnant woman
